subject: Your account has been locked. Immediate action required.
body:
Dear customer,

We have noticed suspicious activity on your banking account.
To restore full access, please verify your details using the link below:
http://secure-bank-verify-login.com/update
If you do not act within 24 hours, your account will be permanently suspended.
Bank Security Team

subject: Password change confirmation
body:
Hello,

This is a confirmation that your password was changed successfully.
If this was NOT you, please open the official banking app or website and reset
your password from there. Do not click links from unexpected emails.

Thank you,
Your Bank

subject: You have won a new smartphone!
body:
Congratulations!

You have been randomly selected to win a brand new smartphone.
To claim your prize, simply click the link below and enter your full name, address,
ID number and bank card details:
http://free-giveaway-prize-claim.com
Offer expires in 30 minutes. Do not miss out!

subject: Security tip of the month
body:
Hi,

This is your monthly security tip newsletter. This month, we remind you to
never share your password or OTP with anyone. If you suspect a phishing email, report it
to your IT or security team.

Best regards,
Security Awareness Team

subject: Unusual login attempt detected
body:
Hello,

We detected an unusual login attempt on your email account from a new device.
If this was you, you can safely ignore this message. If not, please go to the official
webmail website by typing the address into your browser and change your password.
IT Security

subject: Your OTP code: DO NOT SHARE
body:
Your one-time password (OTP) is: 492817

If you did not request this code, someone may
be trying to access your account. Do NOT share this code with anyone by email, SMS or phone.
Account Security

subject: Important: Verify your employee portal access
body:
Dear employee,

We have introduced a new security layer for the employee portal.
To avoid losing access, please confirm your login details at the link below:
http://employee-portal-secure-login.com/verify
Failure to act today will result in a temporary suspension of your account.
IT Support

subject: Reminder: Submit your timesheet
body:
Hello,

This is a reminder to submit your timesheet in the official HR portal
before Friday 17:00. Log in using the same internal link or bookmark you always use.

Best regards,
HR Team

subject: Urgent: Salary payment verification required
body:
Hi,

Due to a system upgrade, we need to confirm your bank account details so that
your salary is not delayed. Please reply to this email with your full name, bank name,

account number and branch code.

Thank you,
Payroll Department

subject: Meeting follow-up: Project notes attached
body:
Hi team,

Attached are the meeting notes from today's project call. The file is a
standard PDF summarising tasks and decisions. No urgent action is required; this is
only for your reference.

Regards,
Project Coordinator

subject: Security Notice: Unusual login to your email account
body:
Hello,

We detected a login to your email account from a new location. If this was not
you, please review your account activity by logging into the official webmail portal.
Do not click on links from unexpected messages or share your password or OTP.
IT Security

subject: Action required: New VPN client installation
body:
Dear user,

To keep remote connections secure, we require all staff to install the
attached VPN client immediately. Open the attached file vpn_update.exe and follow the

instructions.

IT Administration

subject: Payment request from trusted vendor
body:
Hi,

Please find attached the updated invoice from our long-term vendor. Note that their
bank account details have changed due to an internal audit. Make sure all future payments
use the new bank account listed in the attached document.
Vendor Accounts Team

subject: Urgent: CEO request for confidential wire transfer
body:
Hello,

I am currently in a meeting and cannot be disturbed. I need you to urgently
process a confidential wire transfer of funds to the following account for a sensitive
acquisition. Do not call me; just reply to this email when the transfer is complete.
This is highly confidential.

Regards,
Chief Executive Officer

subject: Security training: Phishing simulation results
body:
Hi,

Thank you for participating in our recent phishing simulation exercise. Your results
are now available in the official training portal. Please log in using your normal company
credentials. We will never ask you to enter your password on any site outside the corporate
domain.
Security Awareness Team

subject: Mailbox quota exceeded â€“ action required
body:
Dear user,

Your mailbox has exceeded the storage limit and some emails may not be
delivered. To restore full functionality, please log in to the web portal using the link
below and confirm your account details:
http://webmail-it-support-quota.com/login
Failure to act may result in permanent loss of messages.
Mail Administrator

subject: Invoice query: confirmation of bank details
body:
Hi Finance,

We noticed that the last invoice was paid to our old bank account. Please use
the updated account details in the attached PDF for all future payments. This change is
effective immediately and must be followed today.

Best regards,
Accounts Department

subject: Internal security review meeting
body:
Hello team,

You are invited to an internal security review meeting next week to discuss
recent phishing attempts and how to handle them. The invite has also been sent via the
official calendar system. No attachments are included in this email.

Kind regards,
Information Security Office
